description:
We’re bringing back *THE* feel-good sweatshirt.
What it is: We’re bringing back our limited-edition G Pal Sweatshirt. First released as part of our Holiday 2020 season, this might be the best sweatshirt we’ve ever made: it’s warm and cozy, in a refreshing Licorice Red hue with a super-soft fleecy inside.

Fits the whole shebang.
What it is: The ultimate home for your routine. Tall enough to fit all of the essentials (standing up!), but still slip easily into your tote; made out of coated cotton, so you won't worry about splashing water on it; and with enough pockets to actually help you stay organized. Removable interior pouch, soft zip handles, tall enough for bottles to stand upright
ingredients: Exterior: Cotton, Interior: Polyester and Rayon

description:
Here by popular demand.
What it is: We originally made these for team Glossier because our offices can get pretty chilly. Then everyone started asking for them so, we made more. Classic crewneck, raglan sleeves, with that super soft, plush fleece inside—it feels like something you’ve had forever. Now we can all match!

permanent collection
What it is: Plush hoodie with a kitten-soft fleecy inside, metal-tipped drawstrings, and an open-front pocket pouch. Pink with signature Glossier logo. Smile Wave motif on the back.

Our Hoodies are designed for a comfy fit, meaning they run generous and long—we’d recommend taking your true size (and click our Size Guide if you want to double-check).

Care Instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors, normal cycle only, do not bleach. Tumble dry low, do not iron design.

Hydration station.
What it is: Originally made for Glossier Seattle, our Nalgene Water Bottle quickly became a fan favorite—so we decided to bring it back for good! We love it for a bunch of reasons: the just-right 16 oz. size, the narrow mouth (easy drinking, less spilling), and handy loop top. Plus, it’s durable, BPA free, and lightweight, making it the perfect partner for long hikes or road trips (or just trips to your sofa). In dark green, with a G logo and floral graphic. Dimensions: Height (in): 7", Diameter (in): 3.25", Weight (oz): 3.75

Grab and go.
What it is: A Glossier-pink, netted bag that makes the perfect, take-everywhere companion for your next farmer’s market or beach trip. Lightweight and sized just right to take everywhere, but durable enough to tote home that produce haul. Goodbye, single-use grocery bags!

It’s in the bag.
What it is: By popular demand, our duffel bag is back! With a zippered main compartment and front pocket (plus an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap), it’s roomy enough for all your weekend-getaway or picnic-supply-schlepping needs. In a sunshine yellow shade, stamped with our signature Glossier logo.

It’s in the bag.
What it is: Carry it all-with a zippered main compartment and front pocket (plus an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap for hands-free carrying), it’s roomy enough for all your weekend-getaway or picnic-supply-schlepping needs. In a crisp white shade, stamped with our signature Glossier logo.

For whenever you need a nice compliment.
What it is: We originally made this for the holidays back in 2018, and since then our inbox has been filled with requests for “the little you look good mirror.” What choice did we have but to bring it back?

On the front you’ll find our favorite daily affirmation, and the back is pink acrylic and features our signature G logo

Palm-sized, pocket-sized, fun-sized, fits-in-your-pink-pouch-sized, whatever you call it—it’s 3.25” in diameter, cute and easy to take with you

It comes in a 100% cotton, drawstring pouch to keep your mirror safe from dust and free-range purse lipstick (or repurpose it for jewelry and loose change storage)

That’s a wrap!
What it is: This scarf is bringing fancy back (but only for a *very* limited time). Originally part of our 2020 holiday collection, it’s a silky-satin (but 100% vegan!) fabric, perfect for tying around your shoulders, your hair, your bag strap or anything else you think needs a touch of luxe.

Wear your favorite Balm Dotcoms, all at once.
What it is: Show your love for Balm Dotcom with this fun, yet sophisticated, limited-edition scarf. Originally part of our 2019 holiday collection, it’s a silky-satin (but 100% vegan!) fabric that features swatches of everyone’s favorite lip balm. Tie around your hair, your bag strap or anything else for a pop of Glossier flare. Designed with legendary photographer Raymond Meier’s hand-labeled Balm Dotcom swatches, a special and integral part of Glossier’s production process.
What it is: White cotton adjustable cap with a pre-curved visor. Embroidered with the Glossier logo in white.
What it is: Comfy slip-on slides with molded footbed. 100% PVC pink uppers with signature Glossier logo in red, and contrast white sole. Unisex.
Ultra-glossy pink marbled resin comb embossed with a white Glossier logo. Wear as an accessory or use as a comb.

Comfort zone.

What it is: Extra-plush and cut for a relaxed, slightly oversized fit, our deep green hoodie keeps things cozy year-round (from summer A.C. to wintertime chill). Details we love: the embroidered Glossier logo on the front, an embroidered smile wave on the back, and a small jacquard G-logo patch on the left arm.

Comfy, lavender goodness.
What it is: Extra-plush and cut for a relaxed, slightly oversized fit, our Embroidered Lavender Hoodie keeps things cozy year-round (from summer A.C. to wintertime chill). Pair it with our (new!) Lavender Balm Dotcom for the ultimate in soothing relaxation. Details we love: the embroidered Glossier logo on the front, an embroidered Smile Wave motif on the back, and a small jacquard G-logo patch on the left arm

Comfort zone.
What it is: Plush and slightly oversized, our hoodie keeps things cozy year-round (from summer A.C. to wintertime chill) with a super-soft fleecy inside, metal-tipped drawstrings, and a front pocket pouch. Same as our Original Pink hoodie, but in a subtle, speckled pattern, with our signature Glossier logo.

Glossier from head to toe.
What it is: To celebrate the release of Lavender Balm Dotcom, a supremely comfortable pair of classic-white tube socks with a G-logo and You Look Good reminder woven right in.

Packaging so popular we sell it separately.
Sized to hold an edited selection of only the stuff you need—keys, cards, cash, phone, and...Glossier. They’re easy to open, easy to spot, and the easiest way to keep you organized. Bonus: they’re quart-sized—good for holding liquid-y things in your carry-on. Lined with pink bubble wrap (comes in handy in high-stress situations).

We need to talk about your flair.
Introducing our gold-tone brass pin with official Glossier pink hard enamel fill. Our signature “G” logo was inspired by Gothic blackletter, updated and customized by our extra brilliant and super chic design team. Pin it on your sweater, lapel or anywhere else that could use some Glossier.

Official Glossier hair protection.
Crafted with 80% spa-quality looped terry cotton plus 20% of the most sensual stretch elastic nylon so it fits snug but comfy. Precision-stitched with our signature Glossier “G” in official Glossier pink—Pantone 705. Keeps hairs safe from excess moisture, masks, and face wash. Is cute.
Glossier Visor comes with every order over $30 through 7/5 at midnight EDT
